00001 /* Header file for processing using a script 
00002    Used by process_script.c and run_script.c */
00003 
00004 #ifndef __SCRIPT_H__
00005 #define __SCRIPT_H__
00006 
00007 /* Set the default script name */
00008 #define DEFAULT_SCRIPT "default.sps"
00009 /* The environment variable containing a path to scripts */
00010 #define SCRIPT_ENV    "SPS_PATH"
00011 
00012 /* Frame identifiers */
00013 #define UNKNOWN_FRAME  -1
00014 #define OUTPUT_FRAME   -2
00015 #define INPUT_FRAME    -3
00016 
00017 /* Processing methods */
00018 #define PROC_NULL            -1
00019 #define PROC_SUBTRACT         0
00020 #define PROC_NORMALIZE        1
00021 #define PROC_AMPLIFY          2
00022 #define PROC_GAMMA            3
00023 #define PROC_OFFSET           4
00024 #define PROC_DESPECKLE_MEDIAN 5
00025 #define PROC_KUWAHARA         6
00026 #define PROC_SHARPEN          7
00027 #define PROC_UNSHARP_MASK     8
00028 #define PROC_CONCATENATE      9
00029 #define PROC_COPY            10
00030 #define PROC_GAUSSBLUR       11
00031 
00032 /* Some processing methods cannot have the same input as output.
00033    List these in the following array, end array with PROC_NULL */
00034 
00035 #ifdef SPSORIGIN
00036 int proc_noio[6] = {PROC_DESPECKLE_MEDIAN, PROC_KUWAHARA, 
00037                     PROC_SHARPEN, PROC_UNSHARP_MASK, 
00038                     PROC_GAUSSBLUR, PROC_NULL};
00039 #else
00040 extern int *proc_noio;
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 
00044 /******* Frame processing steps *******
00045  * These structures used when running *
00046  **************************************/
00047 
00048 typedef struct { /* An argument to a processing step */
00049   char *name; /* Name of frame (not used when processing) */
00050   float fval;
00051   int ival;
00052   int frame; /* ID of frame */
00053 }TProcArg;
00054 
00055 typedef struct {  /* Define a processing step */
00056   int method;       /* Which method to use */
00057   int nargs;        /* Number of arguments */
00058   int input;        /* Input frame */
00059   TProcArg *args;   /* Array of arguments */
00060   int result;       /* Result frame */
00061 }TProcess;
00062 
00063 typedef struct { /* Set of sequential commands for processing frames */
00064   int ntemp; /* Number of intermediate frames needed */
00065   int minimum_frame; /* The ID of the minimum frame */
00066   int average_frame; /* ID of average frame */
00067   int nsteps;  /* Number of processing steps */
00068   TProcess *step; /* List of processing steps */
00069 }TCommands;
00070 
00071 /********* GLOBAL VARIABLES ***********/

00073 #define GLOBAL
00074 #else
00075 #define GLOBAL extern
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 GLOBAL TCommands command; /* Defines the processing to be done */
00079 
00080 #undef GLOBAL
00081 
00082 #endif /* __SCRIPT_H__ */
